alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Greene; Madison; Miami; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:36AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN PREBLE, SOUTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN, CLARK, NORTHERN GREENE, MONTGOMERY, SOUTHWESTERN MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 715 AM EDT... At 635 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marysville to Eaton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Springfield, Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Xenia, Trotwood, Miamisburg, Vandalia, Englewood, Tipp City, Eaton, Bellbrook, Moraine, New Carlisle, West Milton, Oakwood, Yellow Springs and Wright-Patterson Afb. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 14 and 66. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 44 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Greene; Madison; Miami; Montgomery; Preble
